title: Bloomberg Markets: MillerCoors Reduces Water Usage by Billions
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: MillerCoors Reduces Water Usage by Billions
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Karina Diehl Director of Community Affairs MillerCoors Discussing the brewers efforts to reduce water usage through strong relationships with growers and innovative techniques. In 2016 the company reduced water usage by more than 15 billion gallons.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
